citation.article-title: Alkanibacter difficilis gen. nov., sp. nov. and Singularimonas variicoloris gen. nov., sp. nov., hexane-degrading bacteria isolated from a hexane-treated biofilter.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Singularimonas (Sin.gu.la.ri.mo′nas. L. adj. singularis extraordinary; Gr. fem n. monas unit, cell; N.L. fem. n. Singularimonas extraordinary unit).
The major fatty acids are 16 : 0 and 18 : 1cis11; iso-branched fatty acids are also present.
The type species is Singularimonas variicoloris.
